text: Kevin Brereton (born February 20, 1972 in Toronto, Ontario) is a Canadian rapper, singer, songwriter and producer better known by his stage name, k-os which is an acronym for Knowledge of Self and is spelt with a lowercase "k". ==Discography== ===Albums=== k-os has released 4 studio albums: Year Album 2002 Exit 2004 Joyful Rebellion 2006 Atlantis: Hymns for Disco 2009 Yes! 2011 BLack on BLond (being released in October) ===Compilations=== Year Album 2007 Collected 2009 The Trill: A Journey so Far ===Mixtapes=== Year Album 2010 The Anchorman Mixtape ==Other websites== * k-os's Official website Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian musicians Category:Canadian rappers Category:People from Whitby, Ontario Category:Singers from Toronto
title: K-os
